import { EmptyLayoutImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# Empty Layout MV
Toggles allow user to turn an option on or off.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <EmptyLayoutImage />
</div>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.EmptyLayoutMV
	android:id="@+id/emptyLayout"
	android:layout_width="match_parent"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
```

```kotlin
with(binding.emptyLayout) {
	imageDrawable =
		if (keyword.isNullOrEmpty()) R.drawable.img_data_not_found
		else R.drawable.ic_no_data_goods_found
	title = string(
		if (keyword.isNullOrEmpty()) R.string.text_no_history
		else R.string.text_no_data_found
	)
	subtitle = string(
		if (keyword.isNullOrEmpty()) R.string.text_no_history_detail
		else R.string.text_no_data_found_detail
	)
}
```

to add action on button reload, you can add this code below
```kotlin
binding.emptyLayout.onBtnClickListener = {
	// TODO: Your action here
}
```
